src.AndroidTempo

Class SessionMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • src.AndroidTempo.SessionMonitor

  • public class SessionMonitor
extends Activity
    This class is the activity that is used to SessionMonitor the state of the data collection session and enter annotations.
    Author:
    Mohammed Nauage

      • onKeyDown

        public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                KeyEvent event)
        Overrides the functionality of the back button to return to the screen prior to the starting of the app.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - A key code that represents the button pressed, from KeyEvent.
        event - The KeyEvent object that defines the button action.
        Returns:
        If you handled the event, return true. If you want to allow the event to be handled by the next receiver, return false.

      • onAnnotationClick

        public void onAnnotationClick(View arg0)
        Prompts the user for an annotation, and saves the annotation and the time at which the annotation was entered to a file.
        Parameters:
        view - The view that was clicked

      • onStopSessionClick

        public void onStopSessionClick(View arg0)
        Ends the current data collection session and activity.
        Parameters:
        view - The view that was clicked
